mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARDS(BOARD_IDX, MEMBER_IDX, CATE_IDX, TITLE, CONTENT , HIT, REG_DATE, BOARD_ORI, BOARD_FILE) VALUES (BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberIdx}, #{cateIdx}, #{title}, #{content} , 0, SYSDATE, #{boardOri}, #{boardFile})
mapper.select: SELECT B.*, M.NICKNAME, C.CATE_NAME FROM BOARDS B JOIN MEMBERS M ON B.MEMBER_IDX = M.MEMBER_IDX JOIN CATEGORYS C ON B.CATE_IDX = C.CATE_IDX WHERE B.BOARD_IDX = #{boardIdx}
